first_translate: look over there!  they’re coming this way.
is that little kid really his grace’s proxy?
I bet she's just some scammer...
this is quite surprising...
it looks like I’m still not used to being back inside a child’s body.

hangle: 이 정도로 노골적인 반응이 나올 줄이야….
first_translate: even so... I didn’t expect them to react this strongly against me...

hangle: 날 의심하고 있었다면서 나한테 영주의 권한을 빌려주다니.
first_translate: if duke abel suspected me of lying about my identity, why did he give me these powers as lord of airelle?

hangle: 아벨은 왜 내게 이 일을 맡겼을까?
first_translate: but why would abel have given me such responsibility?
jeron was more qualified for this job than I am.
well, whatever the reason may be...
all I need to do now is carry out what has been entrusted to me.
the first thing on my agenda will be deciding how those mercenaries are going to be punished.

hangle: 사실 사건을 일으킨 용병을 벌하는 것만큼,
first_translate: punishing the ones responsible isn’t all that matters here.
the significance behind their punishment also plays a crucial role.
in other words, we must make examples out of them.

hangle: 똑같은 짓을 저지르면 너 역시 이 꼴이 된다는 경고.
first_translate: we’ll show everyone else what happens when you commit crimes similar to theirs.

hangle: 이번 일이 잘되면 마을의 치안에 도움이 되겠지만,
first_translate: while punishing them properly could help maintain order within the territory,
a lenient sentence might end up having adverse effects instead.
when people see others getting away with light punishments,
that makes me think maybe I can do it too.
that’s simply human nature.

hangle: 북부에 어울리는 처벌 방법이 뭐가 있을까….
first_translate: let’s see... what kind of punishment fits best for the north region?

hangle: 음…. 도둑질을 하면 손목을 자르기까지 하니까….
first_translate: since thieves lose their hands if caught stealing,
then perhaps something along those lines would work well for sexual harassment cases--

hangle: 역시 중요 부위를 자를 수밖에 없나….
first_translate: maybe cutting off certain parts from their bodies...
cutting off what exactly...?
no, nevermind.
I knew I shouldn’t have sent siegren away.
if chopping things off isn’t an option,

hangle: 그래, 이 두 가지 중에 선택하라고 하자.
first_translate: then let’s try one of these two options.
fiona.
they’ve arrived.
my goodness, look at her size...
doesn’t anyone know what his grace is thinking right now?
do you guys believe she’s actually his grace’s proxy?
excuse me...
can you please move aside?
stay calm, siegren.
alright then...
thank you very much...

hangle: 이 상황에 넌 화도 안 나?
first_translate: aren’t you even angry at this situation?
getting mad doesn’t solve anything.
h-hey!
wait a minute!
what is it?
it’s alright, siegren...
lady charlotte,

hangle: 어쩌다 이런 거친 일을 맡게 된 건지 모르겠지만….
first_translate: I don’t understand why someone like yourself had to take part in this case,
but those men aren’t going to go quietly into the night.

hangle: 하지만 저런 자들이 마을에서 활개 치면
first_translate: and yet, wouldn’t you feel uncomfortable...
...if scum like them were allowed to roam around freely in our village?
even so...

hangle: 어린애가 위험한 자들을 상대하는 걸 보고만 있을 수는 없어요.
first_translate: I cannot stand by while a young girl puts herself in danger dealing with dangerous criminals alone.
m-may I ask your name?
i-it’s charlotte.
thanks for worrying about me, charlotte.
let’s go, siegren.
shut up and put me down!

hangle: 우리들이 없으면 마물의 밥이나 될 것들이!!
first_translate: you bastards would become nothing but food for monsters without us!!
t-take it easy!
move outta the way!
why are we suddenly being punished?!
go screw yourselves!!
there they are.
he seems incredibly strong...

hangle: 병사 두세 명으로도 감당하기 힘들어 보여.
first_translate: not even three soldiers together could handle him.
who does that brat think she is?!
huh?
oh, great. looky what we got here.
so you’re still alive after all.
calm down, siegren...
how dare you use your strength to bully villagers...
...and beat up poor little siegren?
on top of that, you committed robbery, assault, and sexually harassed women...

hangle: 살인 외에 저지를 수 있는 건 다 저질렀다지.
first_translate: other than murder, you've done everything wrong imaginable.
those terrible bastards...
I come under orders from duke abel helyon.
please stop resisting unnecessarily.
hm?
argh!!
who the hell are you to tell us what to do, huh?!
you think you can treat us however you want because you’re the daughter of some noble family or something?

hangle: 용병단이 전부 마을을 떠나면 너희들도 다 끝장이야.
first_translate: as soon as all the mercenary groups leave this place, you'll be finished.

hangle: 마물이 쳐들어올 때 막아준 게 누군데!
first_translate: who saved you lot from monsters anyway?!
right!
ungrateful wretches!
these jerks!

hangle: 맞다…. 대화는 말이 통해야 하는 거지?
first_translate: ah yes... communication works both ways.
gaah!

hangle: 말로 했을 때 들으면 얼마나 좋아.
first_translate: now listen carefully to what I say next.
okay, sit down nicely--
or not.
aaargh!!!
enough...
that’s enough for today.
kneel down and stay quiet.
